sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"怀疑的，不确定的"之意。
means: questionable ： 通常指怀疑某行为是否恰当，或指有根有据的怀疑。
doubtful ： 指对某个问题持积极怀疑的，有疑问的态度，强调缺乏确信。
ambigous ： 指因缺乏明确感或因为有各种不同的解释而值得怀疑。
uncertain ： 多指因缺乏证据或了解而捉摸不定，也指因不能预料而不能作出选择。

sentence.Network_en: His best friend was killed by police under extremely questionable circumstances.
sentence.Network_cn: 他最好的朋友在极其可疑的情况下被警察打死了。

sentence.Network_en: It is questionable whether the expenditure on this project is really justified.
sentence.Network_cn: 该项目的开支是否真的合理还未可知。

sentence.Network_en: He has been dogged by allegations of questionable business practices.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一直被那些指控他有不正当商业行为的说法所困扰。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《Friends》词汇表B ... thistle n. [植]蓟 questionable adj. 可疑的 bedspread n. 床单, 床罩.

大学英语六级词汇表_大学六级 ... quest v．n． 搜寻，探求 questionable a． 可疑的，不可靠的 questionnaire n． 调查表，征求意见 …
questionable 可疑的; 有问题的,有怀疑的,可疑的; (?) 有疑问; 可疑; Questionable Aircraft 可疑航空器(或称不明机); 可疑航空器; Questionable Cause 由此即.

list.abs: 一品泊 www.yipinpo.com ... 联系我们/ contact 热门问题/ questions 团队博客/ blogs.

人教版七年级上册英语单词表 ... her pron. 她的 question n. 问题；难题；询问；疑问 answer n. 回答；答复；答案.

entry.tran: 可疑的;不可靠的;有问题的;不确定的
entry.def: If you say that something is questionable, you mean that it is not completely honest, reasonable, or acceptable.

example.ex: He has been dogged by allegations of questionable business practices...
example.tran: 他一直被那些指控他有不正当商业行为的说法所困扰。

example.ex: It is questionable whether the expenditure on this project is really justified...
example.tran: 该项目的开支是否真的合理还未可知。

auth_sentence.content: If it is questionable, it is not absolute.
auth_sentence.res_content: If it is questionable, it is not absolute.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If it is questionable, it is not absolute.

auth_sentence.content: The facts given by the witness are highly questionable.
auth_sentence.res_content: The facts given by the witness are highly questionable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The facts given by the witness are highly questionable.

auth_sentence.content: It's still an estimate that seems highly questionable.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's still an estimate that seems highly questionable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's still an estimate that seems highly questionable.

stems_affixes.word_buile: question问题;询问+aire表名词或形容词→n.调查表, 问卷 adj.质问的
con全部+quest寻求,询问→全部寻求到→征服
in进入+quest寻求,询问→问进去→审问
quest寻求,询问→n.探寻,探求;寻求,追求
quest寻求,询问+ion表名词→n.问题;询问 v.询问;怀疑,对…表示疑问
question问题;询问+aire表名词或形容词→n.调查表, 问卷 adj.质问的
re再+quest寻求,询问→在寻求→请求
quest寻求,询问+ion表名词→n.问题;询问 v.询问;怀疑,对…表示疑问

sentences.en: Your argument is based on a set of questionable assumptions.
sentences.cn: 你的论证建立在一套有问题的假设上。

sentences.en: Their motives for undertaking this study are highly questionable.
sentences.cn: 他们承担这项研究的动机大有问题。
